" This native app is developed to overcome the limitations of the progressive web app due to the lack of support for push notifications in ios. This app is accessible only by registered business users and is a purely an opt-in service. The user has the choice to opt-in for notifications or opt-out at any time. The information in this app is not shared with any third parties and this notifications app is only intended to enhance/aid/compliment the businesses in which the user is associated or employed or registered."
